item.title: OpenCart: Delete Multi-Store and Move Everything to the Default Store
item.description: Make a BACKUP before doing anything to the database. Be safe. Assumptions This post assumes that the store_id for Default store is 0 you have only 1 multi-store you are moving things from Multi-store to Default store you want to delete Multi-Store you have products that were added to both Default and Multi-store everything means products, categories, manufacturers and information We can’t delete a multi-store if there are orders associated with it.
